Summary._: Southbound [A] trains are running with delays because of a train with mechanical problems at 42 St-Port Authority/Bus Terminal.

Expect delays on [A] [C] and [E] train service.

Summary._: [D] trains are stopping along the [N] line from 36 St to Stillwell Av in both directions because of Con Ed power problems affecting signals at 36 St (Brooklyn).

Expect delays on [D] [N] and [R] trains

Summary._: There are delays on [E] trains because of signal problems at Jamaica Center-Parsons/Archer.

Description._: There are delays on [E] trains because of signal problems at Jamaica Center-Parsons/Archer.

LongDescription:
There is reduced [E] train service out of Jamaica Center-Parsons/Archer because of a signal problem.

Some [E] trains are stopping along the [F] line between Jamaica-179 St and Kew Gardens-Union Tpke.

Expect delays in both directions.

As an alternative, consider using the [J] or [Z] at Jamaica Center-Parsons/Archer.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Until Jul 27, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM and 3 PM to 10 PM [7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Until Jul 27, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM and 3 PM to 10 PM [7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Until Jul 27, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM and 3 PM to 10 PM
[7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts


Rush hour [7D] express service runs between Mets-Willets Point and 74 St-Broadway

For Midtown Manhattan, consider [E] and [F] service via transfer at 74 St-Broadway/Roosevelt Av.

Summary._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

Description._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

LongDescription:
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 23 - 27 • Jul 30 - Aug 3, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Brighton Beach-bound [B] trains run local from Prospect Park to Sheepshead Bay in Brooklyn

TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 23 - 27 • Jul 30 - Aug 3, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
96 St-bound [Q] trains run express from Sheepshead Bay to Prospect Park in Brooklyn


Trains stop at Kings Hwy, Newkirk Plaza and Church Av.

For service to Neck Rd, Avenue U, Avenue M, Avenue J, Avenue H, Cortelyou, Beverley Rds and Parkside Av, take the [Q] to Kings Hwy, Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park and transfer to a Brighton Beach-bound [B]* or Coney Island-bound [Q].

For service from these stations, take the [B] or [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza, Kings Hwy or Sheepshead Bay and transfer to a 96 St-bound [Q].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.
